text: March 22, 2018 / 10:33 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Kennady Diamonds Says ISS & Glass Lewis, Recommend Mountain Province & Kennady Shareholders Vote For Business Combination Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Kennady Diamonds Inc: * KENNADY DIAMONDS - ISS & GLASS LEWIS, RECOMMEND SHAREHOLDERS OF MOUNTAIN PROVINCE & KENNADY VOTE FOR BUSINESS COMBINATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
